main.name: Hashirr Lukmahn
main.description: Hi everyone! Welcome to my website. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Hello! I'm Hashirr, an international student from Singapore currently pursuing my studies in Computer Science. I'm passionate about software development and artificial intelligence, and I love experimenting with various AI frameworks like IBM Watson, LLAMA, and others in my free time!
main.bio2: Beyond my academic and technical pursuits, I'm an avid badminton player and enjoy exploring the great outdoors through hiking. Whether I'm analyzing data or hitting the trails, I'm always looking for new ways to challenge myself and grow both personally and professionally.
main.bio3: Welcome to my personal website, where I share my projects, interests, and insights into the exciting world of technology
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers
